article_title: Both bridges going up during evening rush
article_text:
An inspection of the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge led to lane closures on July 20, 2015. (Photo: NCDOT)

WILMINGTON, NC (WWAY) — Drivers headed in or out of New Hanover County into Brunswick County could see some delays tonight.

According to a bridge tender, the Isabel Holmes Bridge is going up around 6 p.m. tonight, with the Cape Fear Memorial Bridge going up at around 6:45 p.m. The times are approximate.

Drivers should expect delays during that time.
